bill_title: to clarify and restrict certain township zoning powers.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to clarify and restrict certain township zoning powers. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 8-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Except as provided in § 8-2-9, no township may exercise zoning powers. No township action may contravene a county's exercise of county zoning authority. The township and its residents may be involved in the zoning process only to the extent of their input into the comprehensive county planning and zoning requirements as provided in chapter 11-2. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
